about_the_game:
Shape the Story with Your Choices:

As a new ice age slowly pushes the world toward extinction, witness the experiences of the Narrator, one of the few remaining survivors. In this choice-driven game, you will determine the fate of the character telling the story and how it all ends. In a world on the brink of destruction, where loneliness has become a form of madness, decide what the Narrator will do under conditions no sane person could endure.

You can keep your body warm, but can you protect your mind from the cold?

Experience the winter that brought the apocalypse and the solitude of an abandoned world. The journey of the Narrator, seemingly impossible yet somehow real, is in your hands. Shape the course of the story with your choices. While doing so, try to preserve both the Narrator’s sanity and your own.

Do whatever it takes to protect the Narrator from hunger and cold.

The Narrator’s vital stats may limit your choices or open new paths. Can he fight if he’s not brave enough? Can he stay sane if he’s too hungry? Can he even survive if he hasn’t lost his mind just enough?

Manage limited resources wisely to ensure he doesn’t lose his sanity entirely—or just enough to survive. Search for hidden objects, make the right choices, or simply rely on luck to stock up on food, fuel, water, and other essential supplies.

Uncover the remnants of the old world:

Discover artifacts buried beneath the ruins and junk heaps. Unravel their secrets and experience the stories of a world long gone.

Step into the Narrator’s dreams:

"They say a madman's dreams are just as mad as he is."

Enter the Narrator’s dreams, where each one opens the door to a completely different fantasy world. Experience surreal tales far removed from reality. Make the right choices to ensure the dreams reach their proper conclusions and gain advantages that will impact the Narrator’s true story.

Test your skills in various mini-games, from turn-based combat to high-stakes Wild West duels.

Prove the Narrator’s abilities, earn rewards, uncover hidden objects in the scenes, learn new skills, and use them to overcome the challenges you encounter.

content_descriptors.notes: This game's story explores themes such as death, the meaninglessness of life, the true purpose of survival, and loneliness. It does not contain detailed depictions of extreme violence but may include implications of such acts. The game does not explicitly depict nudity, but there may be implications of nudity or acts involving sexual violence.

short_description: "What music would you listen to at the end of the world?" Explore an abandoned world after the apocalypse of the final winter. Shape the story of a man whose loneliness threatens his sanity. Use violence to survive or avoid it to protect your mind. Experience the end of the world!
